title: Update membership page fallback pricing and enforce monthly display across plans

requirements.summary: Align Membership page fallback pricing with new lower backend defaults so UI shows correct prices when catalog load fails.
acceptanceCriteria: When membership catalog fetch fails, the Membership page displays Basic $4.99/month, Pro $14.99/month, Enterprise $39.99/month using fallback pricing.

file_operations.description: Update FALLBACK_PRICING to match the new backend defaults (in cents as bigint): Basic monthlyPriceCents=499n annualPriceCents=4999n; Pro monthlyPriceCents=1499n annualPriceCents=14999n; Enterprise monthlyPriceCents=3999n annualPriceCents=39999n. Keep sale fields disabled in fallbacks (isOnSale=false, salePriceCents=undefined) so the fallback UI matches the default non-sale behavior.

requirements.summary: Show monthly pricing period label for all membership plans, including Enterprise.
acceptanceCriteria: Enterprise plan card shows pricing with period label "/ month" (not "/ year").
Basic and Pro plan cards continue to show pricing with period label "/ month".

file_operations.description: Adjust the Membership page plan configuration so Enterprise uses monthly pricing display (set Enterprise plan period to 'monthly' like Basic and Pro). Ensure the rendered period label remains "month" for all plan cards by using the existing getPriceDisplay(period='monthly') flow.
